website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality charging station that guarantees you can quickly and effortlessly charge your controllers.
pros: Features a gold-plated connector for fast charging
Requires about 3.5 hours to fully recharge a controller
Enables you to charge two controllers at the same time
Includes a built-in LED indicator light that allows you to check your controller's charging status
cons: Does not come with a wall adapter

customer_reviews.title: Charge and keep playing!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second charger 'like' this. I couldn't find the charger I bought the first time so I bought this one to give as a gift to my boyfriend so he'd stop stealing mine. He loves it just the same. My favorite thing about this charger is it has the extra pegs so you don't have to charge your battery with your controller. We can switch out the dead battery for the charged one and put the dead one on the charger and keep playing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was awesome at first
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a terrible product but I've only had it a couple of months and one of the charging ports is becoming more and more unusable. The connection is getting harder to manage and I'm having to wiggle the battery or push it hard to get it to connect. I'm sure it's just a faulty one but I can't do anything about it now since it's outside of my 30 days. I do like the ability to charge the batteries by themselves or with the controller attached. However, finding the right position for it to work is difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Heather and Doug

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking chargerger
customer_reviews.text: It is a really cool looking charger. The batteries fit perfect, but don't secure in, I guess in a way it's ok because it makes it easy to change them out quick. The battery life however is too short compared to the one I purchased from Best Buy. That is the reason I give it 4 stars. I also liked that it was delivered quicker than what was quoted
customer_reviews.author: Gv

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, just slight preferences of mine.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice charger howerver ive since gone and bought different set of rechargeables. 1 star off because the charger on green is too bright, all my gaming stuff if in my bedroom and the charger just lit the entire room, i couldve unplugged it every night but couldnt be bothered. If you have your setup in your basement of living room then this might not bother you. 2nd star off because the batteries just dont have enough juice. The batteries wouldnt last me a full day, however, i do game longer than most people. If you game for a prolonged period of time id recommend looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: No more purchasing batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Never buying batteries again! My son loves it, he doesn’t have to worry about dead batteries again. He charges one controller while he uses the other, very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Herb

customer_reviews.title: Quit after 7 months
customer_reviews.text: We have had thus charging unit for about 8 months now. At first it did just fine but about a month ago it has gotten really touchy to where it wont vharge the batteries full if at all. You have to get it on there just right or it will say its done charging even tho it hasnt charged it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Solves my problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because for whatever reason my xbox gives off an annoying buzzing sound to anyone in voice chat while my old microsoft play and charge kit was plugged in. I figured if I could have 2 packs to swap around AND the ability to charge overnight that'd be great. This product does both. On top of that, the LED indicators showing charge state are so bright. If you're scared of the dark the thing doubles as a night light. Would recommend to anyone scared of the dark or that have the same buzzing sound issues as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler S.

customer_reviews.title: Rotating batteries for gameplay couldn't be easier
customer_reviews.text: Have one charging while you're playing and switch them out when one gets low. Gameplay is easy with products like this. No problems and I've been using it for almost a year. Update: Feb 2020 They’re still doing awesome and make gaming or just general use so easy. Glad I didn’t pay probably another $80 in batteries in the last year.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Tate

customer_reviews.title: Dont keep buying batteries!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This works great, pug in your controller or rechargable batteries directly.. super small and super functional.. if you have an Xbox this is absolutely a need.
customer_reviews.author: JT L.

customer_reviews.title: NICE!!
customer_reviews.text: Works Great I'm so thankful we finally got this and so cheap I have spent so much on batteries. Yes no longer. I definitely recommend getting these they are long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's fast charging
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this after the port was damaged on the battery packs from plugging and unplugging it.
customer_reviews.author: Gloriana

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good product compare to what I pay very light weight dont feel soo solid but work perfect for money I pay for it
customer_reviews.author: kd....Washington

customer_reviews.title: Blahh
customer_reviews.text: The battery life doesn’t last long. I am not a huge gamer but I get annoyed changing and charging them when I just did.
customer_reviews.author: marlen

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2 years. All it does is charge batteries, so why does it stop working after 2 years?
customer_reviews.author: t.n.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy to dock, the only problem I had is the longevity of the rechargeable batteries after a year.
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: Saves money on AAs!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for my husband's birthday because we were burning through AA batteries. This has already saved us money. I recommend it for anyone that has an xbox.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian J.

customer_reviews.title: Great life and saves money
customer_reviews.text: Jeez we have saved so much on batteries! WHy didn't I order them sooner?! The batteries fit snug in my original controllers. Great life and saves money!
customer_reviews.author: C. Mcafee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this it’s so easy and convenient.. works great and help keeps the controls organized and in one place while charging .. great product
customer_reviews.author: Cori Meri

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool and durable. Lights red when charging, and green when done / standby.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Calderon

customer_reviews.title: really nice and solidly  built
customer_reviews.text: perfect for what i needed and charges pretty fast for constant single player gaming haven't tried with multiple people using then chargeing
customer_reviews.author: marco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buy
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, easy to install and readable charge light !
customer_reviews.author: Samaira Truss

customer_reviews.title: Helpful led indicators, and not too much branding.
customer_reviews.text: I like how quickly the batteries charge, however the dock and batteries are smaller than expected, but that is not a bad thing. I was hoping for a beaded micro usb cable but it’s very good charger. These type of chargers because you save lots of money on batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua willson

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Had this setup for almost a year now i think and was wary at first because it was cheap, but I've been pleasantly surprised. Battery life is good and i like the aesthetic of the lighting that indicates charged or charging.
customer_reviews.author: IShopOnlineBecauseSalesmanScareMe

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and saves me money, Win WIn!
customer_reviews.text: Must have for gamers who hate having to buy loads of batteries! Packs don’t sit perfectly into the controller but it’s not too annoying. Usually can last me 8-10 hours of use which is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product, works perfectly, easy to install and assumes the function it has. Loads the controls in a short time!
customer_reviews.author: Bia

customer_reviews.title: Looks greats and works better!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 units and we love them. Recharge and look awesome. Keeps the controllers in one place. The batteries were a snap to install and the delivery was right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos F. Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. Love the ease of just setting it on the dock.
customer_reviews.author: Korra

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: My son has not complained about it not working so I assume it’s working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Farmerswife3404

customer_reviews.title: Working as Expected
customer_reviews.text: So far the charges have worked great and we've been able to use them both charging the controller as well as the battery pack separately. Saves a ton of AA batteries !
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: So far we haven't had any problems. It's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Young

customer_reviews.title: Well made product.
customer_reviews.text: Charges controllers quickly , easy to set controller in and easy to tell when its done.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Loved them
customer_reviews.text: Got one for my son and son in law so they don't go through batteries anymore
customer_reviews.author: margaret ramaker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Holds the controllers securely and charges them quickly. Best charging dock we've had for the Xbox one controllers.
customer_reviews.author: mfred004

customer_reviews.title: Fast charging
customer_reviews.text: Quick charging and batteris last about 4 hours on a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: LDAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Comes with two batteries perfect for one controller, if you have 2 controllers get 3, or 4 batteries because you can switch them in game fast and easy
customer_reviews.author: Nick Diederich

customer_reviews.title: Good charger
customer_reviews.text: Charges my controllers just as expected. Also for the people wondering, yes this works with an elite controller.
customer_reviews.author: Jarod

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a few months and no complaints so far. Doing its job well.
customer_reviews.author: KENEISHA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for frequent gamers. The battery life is great and the price is even better.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Work great on both standard Xbox one cooler and the one s controller. Was shipped fast and in perfect condition. So far battery life seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Great device!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this charger, says it quick and loves that he can play and charge at the same! Great device!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa S

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it. It was just what he wanted
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more batteries. No wasteful spending
customer_reviews.text: The lights are cool. Controller batteries last about 2 hours. But you can always recharge quickly and easily
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Rusnock

customer_reviews.title: Garbage 🗑
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for like 4 months then they would not charge at all to the point they stop working completely..
customer_reviews.author: Tahleezus Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good so far, wish I could toggle lights
customer_reviews.text: Seems good so far, I wish the lights turned off when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: AJ S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was great, controllers fit nicely...and no more replacing batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Heiser

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Just unboxed it and one of the charging ports doesn't even work!
customer_reviews.author: Easy E 1017

customer_reviews.title: Can charge it without putting the controller on
customer_reviews.text: Can charge with or without the controller, plugs right into the Xbox and pretty sleek looking.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Apa

customer_reviews.title: This review is payed for bye Microsoft
customer_reviews.text: Had this item for over a year works great I highly recommended it
customer_reviews.author: Tommy yonko

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Just got this about a month ago. Product stopped working and would take a charge after leaving it plugged in one time overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Justin DH

customer_reviews.title: very happy with purchase and quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: very nifty item, very happy with purchase and quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I will buy another when I have the money.
customer_reviews.author: Myztery

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: felt cheap right out of the box, not to my surprise didn’t look cool and the batteries got stuck to my controller had to pull really hard resulting me breaking the clip on the battery... would not recommend this charger look else where fellow gamers
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Broken LED or false image? I was expecting the ...
customer_reviews.text: Broken LED or false image? I was expecting the dock to have the multi looking color but it didn't light up that way. Whatever it is I returned it for my money back.
customer_reviews.author: D3lirium

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like it.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like this product at all. I bought it as an early Xmas gift for my boyfriend, to eliminate the buying of batteries. While the item arrived quickly, and in good packaging it doesn’t work. The batteries don’t stay charged nor do the controllers. Complete waste of money, worst Xmas gift ever I was told.
customer_reviews.author: User

product_meta.title: GameSir Xbox One Dual Charging Dock Charger Station with 2X 800mAh Rechargeable Batteries and 3.3ft USB Cable for Xbox One/One S/One Elite Wireless Controller
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackGameSir Xbox One Dual Controller Charger 

Say goodbye to AA batteries! GameSir xbox rechargeable battery station is specifically designed for charging the batteries of Xbox One / Xbox One S /Xbox One X / Xbox One Elite Controllers. You will no longer need to keep buying batteries for your controllers. 
When not gaming, simply put the equipped Xbox One Controller on the Charging Station and it will start charging automatically without the need to remove the battery. When fully charged, leave controllers on the xbox one charging station will never harm your controllers, for it has protective security with over-charge protection inside. This is a quick and easy process to charge each controller, thanks to the dual conductive leads. 
At MasTechBox, we create lasting products that help people benefit from the power of technology and make life better, easier and more fulfilling. 

Product Specifications: 

Note 1: Connecting the USB cable with the controllers directly will also allow charging. 
Note 2: The dual charging dock only compatible with the batteries included. 
Fast charging via Xbox One console. 
Controllers fully charging time: 3.5 hours 
Color: Black 
USB Cable Length: 3.3ft 
Product Size: 5.51 x 2.36 x 1.57 inch 

MasTechBox Comprehensive Warranty: 

All MasTechBox products come with a 30-day money-back guarantee so our customers can purchase without worry. A happy customer experience is our #1 priority and so we also stand by our customers with a 12-month warranty. Simply contact us and we will happily send a replacement if any issues arise. 

Package Includes: 

1 x Xbox One Battery Charging Dock 
2 x 800mAh Rechargeable Batteries 
1 x USB Cable (3.3ft) 
1 x User Manual 

In addition, what you receive also include 30-day full refund, and 12-month warranty with friendly customer service.
feature_bullets: Premium charging station specially designed for Xbox One / One X/Xbox One S / Xbox One Elite wireless controllers, simultaneously store and charge 2 Xbox One controllers. Gold-plated connector for fast speed charging. Controllers fully charged in 3.5 hours.

Includes 2 800mAh rechargeable battery packs to keep on gaming for hours. No need to remove the battery when charging the controllers. But both charging the batteries and charging the controllers with batteries are supported.
Built in LED indicator for charging status, red LED indicates batteries being charging and standby mode, green LED indicates fully charged.

Xbox One controller battery charger station is safety guaranteed, highly protective security with over-charge protection and secure circuitry, stops charging automatically when the battery is fully charged.
Replaces the Xbox One official controller battery housing with a rechargeable battery pack for up to 10-12 hours of playtime. Note: Xbox One controllers are not included.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars268 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
